name: Conexteo – SMS for Woocommerce
author: Conexteo

sections.description:
Our module allows you to easily send SMS to your customers to inform them of their order, a change in status or any other important message.
Integrated contact synchronization.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the dir to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set up your api key and secret key in the settings page

short_description: Our module allows you to easily send SMS to your customers to inform them of their order, a change in status or any other important message.
